fullplot: In the 1930s, the feeble-minded Sven's mother dies and he is hired as a farm-hand at the rich, affluent Hèglund's farm. He has to work without pay and sleeps together with the cows. He meets the disabled Anna who is the first one to treat him as an adult. One day he has had enough of Hèglund's maltreatment and moves in with Anna's family.
plot: A mentally challenged man escapes from his tyrannical master and finds happiness when a poor family takes him in.
title: The Simple-Minded Murderer
